ygData.subject: Umbra: headless or Xvfb
ygData.msgSnippet: Simple question, I hope! If running umbra in a docker container, should I start chromium as --headless or should I install and display it on a dummy X display

Subject: Umbra: headless or Xvfb
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=582247024
From: Colin Rosenthal <csr@...>

Simple question, I hope! If running umbra in a docker container, should 
I start chromium as --headless or should I install and display it on a 
dummy X display using Xvfb?

cheers,
Colin

-- 
Colin Rosenthal PhD
Senior IT Consultant
Royal Danish Library (Aarhus)
